about.title: About Us
about.heading: Passion for every detail
about.description: We create unique experiences blending food, atmosphere, and service so every visit feels special.
about.txt1: At La Meva Llar, we celebrate the essence of Mediterranean cuisine with timeless recipes made from fresh, local ingredients.
about.txt2: Our space is designed for people to come together and enjoy good food, heartfelt moments, and the warmth of home.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
